mapper.select: select f.position,s.true_name,s.stu_code,s.home_phone,s.phone,s.home_addr,s.email,s.QQNUM from sj_student s,sj_files f where s.ID=f.STU_ID and s.STU_CODE=#{stu_code}

SELECT a.STU_CODE,a.TRUE_NAME,d.POSITION from sj_student a,sj_groups b,sj_group_members c,sj_files d,sj_practice_task e where b.ID=c.GROUP_ID and a.ID=d.STU_ID and c.USER_ID=a.ID and b.PRACTICE_ID=e.ID and length(c.USER_ID) = 12 and e.TEA_ID=#{tea_id} and #{begin_upload_time}<d.UPLOAD_TIME and #{end_upload_time}>d.UPLOAD_TIME and #{group_name}=b.group_name
SELECT * FROM sj_files WHERE FILE_TYPE=4 AND STU_ID=#{stu_id} ORDER BY left(FILE_NAME, 7) DESC, upload_time DESC
SELECT * FROM sj_files WHERE FILE_TYPE='4' AND STU_ID=#{stu_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sj_direct_record WHERE TEMP1='1' AND create_time> str_to_date(#{start_time}, '%Y-%m-%d ') AND create_time<str_to_date(#{end_time}, '%Y-%m-%d ') AND PRACTICE_ID=#{pric}
SELECT * FROM sj_files WHERE FILE_TYPE='25' AND FILE_NAME=#{id}
